Headline: Where Dreams Take Flight.
AdCopy: Every journey begins with a dream. Skybag is more than just luggage; it's your partner in every aspiration, built for every path you choose.

Scenes.description: A young woman, brightly dressed, confidently pulls her sleek Skybag trolley through a bustling, sunlit airport terminal. She pauses, looking out a large window at planes taking off, a hopeful smile on her face. She checks her boarding pass, then looks forward with determination.

Voiceover.English: For the spirit that dares to explore, for every new horizon.
Voiceover.Hindi: उस हौसले के लिए जो नए रास्ते तलाशता है, हर नए क्षितिज के लिए।

Scenes.description: A young professional (could be male or female) in smart casuals walks purposefully through a vibrant, modern city square during peak hours. Their stylish Skybag backpack sits comfortably. They glance at their phone, then look up at a towering skyscraper, a look of focus and ambition.

Voiceover.English: For the ambition that builds tomorrow, for every goal you conquer.
Voiceover.Hindi: उस लगन के लिए जो कल बनाती है, हर लक्ष्य को जीतने के लिए।

Scenes.description: A group of friends (diverse age range) are on a scenic mountain hike. One person, with a durable Skybag duffel slung over their shoulder, reaches a stunning viewpoint. They place their bag down, take out a camera, and capture the breathtaking landscape, sharing a joyful moment with friends.

Voiceover.English: For the moments that refresh your soul, for every story you create.
Voiceover.Hindi: उन पलों के लिए जो आपकी आत्मा को ताज़ा करते हैं, हर कहानी के लिए जो आप रचते हैं।

Voiceover.English: From the bustling city to the serene mountains, Skybag is crafted to be your reliable companion. Durable, stylish, and ready for whatever life brings. Your journey awaits. Make every step count with Skybag.
Voiceover.Hindi: हलचल भरे शहर से शांत पहाड़ों तक, Skybag आपका विश्वसनीय साथी बनने के लिए बनाया गया है। टिकाऊ, स्टाइलिश और जीवन में आने वाली हर चुनौती के लिए तैयार। आपकी यात्रा इंतज़ार कर रही है। Skybag के साथ हर कदम को महत्वपूर्ण बनाएं।

Headline: Beyond Skin Deep: Embrace Your Beautiful.
AdCopy: Every day, a new opportunity to feel confident and cherished. Dove helps you celebrate the beauty that's uniquely yours.

Scenes.description: A young woman, with diverse skin tone, steps out of the shower, gently wraps herself in a towel. She looks at her reflection in the mirror, not critically, but with a soft smile and contentment, touching her freshly moisturized arm. A bottle of Dove body wash/bar is visible on the counter.
Scenes.location: Modern, clean bathroom with warm lighting.

Voiceover.English: "Life is a journey of discovery. Starting with yourself."
Voiceover.Hindi: "जीवन खोज की यात्रा है। जिसकी शुरुआत आपसे होती है।"

Scenes.description: A mother (middle-aged) and her young child (around 5-7 years old) are sitting on a park bench. The child gently traces the lines on the mother's hand, then rests their head on her arm. The mother smiles warmly, looking at her child, then at her own soft, cared-for skin.
Scenes.location: Sunny, green park with families in the background.

Voiceover.English: "Every touch, every moment, deserves gentleness."
Voiceover.Hindi: "हर स्पर्श, हर पल, कोमलता का हकदार है।"

Scenes.description: A diverse group of friends (men and women, varying ages and body types) are laughing and enjoying a casual outdoor gathering. One person is confidently striking a pose for a photo, another is sharing a heartfelt story, all comfortable and beaming in their own skin. The sun is setting, casting a warm glow.
Scenes.location: Lively outdoor cafe or rooftop garden.

Voiceover.English: "Step out. Embrace who you are, truly."
Voiceover.Hindi: "बाहर निकलो। आप जो हैं, उसे पूरी तरह अपनाओ।"

Voiceover.English: "Dove understands that true beauty is unique, real, and radiates from within. It's about feeling confident and comfortable in your own skin, every single day. Celebrate your authentic self. Embrace your beautiful, with Dove."
Voiceover.Hindi: "डव समझता है कि सच्ची सुंदरता अनूठी, वास्तविक है और भीतर से चमकती है। यह हर दिन अपनी त्वचा में आत्मविश्वास और सहज महसूस करने के बारे में है। अपने प्रामाणिक स्वरूप का जश्न मनाएं। डव के साथ, अपनी सुंदरता को अपनाएं।"

Headline: Ignite Your Spark. Refresh Your World.
AdCopy: Life's grandest moments and everyday triumphs deserve a celebration that truly refreshes. Reach for the taste that fuels your journey forward.

Scenes.description: A young woman, sweat glistening on her forehead, puts down her paint brush, stepping back to admire a vibrant, finished mural on a city wall. She smiles, a look of immense satisfaction. She reaches for a chilled Pepsi bottle from a cooler nearby, takes a long, satisfying sip.

Voiceover.English: Every stroke, every effort, a piece of your soul on display. This is your masterpiece.
Voiceover.Hindi: हर स्ट्रोक, हर कोशिश, आपकी आत्मा का एक टुकड़ा। यह आपकी कृति है।

Scenes.description: A diverse group of friends (3-4 people) are laughing and high-fiving on a rooftop after successfully setting up a community garden. They look a bit tired but exhilarated. One friend pops open a can of Pepsi, passing it around, and they all take refreshing sips, sharing a moment of collective joy. Sunlight bathes them.
Scenes.emotion: Camaraderie, collective triumph, happiness, shared relief.

Voiceover.English: Together, you built something beautiful. Together, you made a difference.
Voiceover.Hindi: साथ मिलकर, आपने कुछ खूबसूरत बनाया। साथ मिलकर, आपने बदलाव लाया।

Scenes.description: A young man, dressed in smart casuals, looks out from his office window at a bustling city, a thoughtful yet determined expression on his face. He’s just closed a big deal or achieved a significant professional milestone. He turns, picks up a can of Pepsi from his desk, and takes a reflective, confident sip. A slight smile plays on his lips, looking towards future possibilities.
Scenes.emotion: Determination, quiet confidence, forward-looking, reflection, ambition.

Voiceover.English: Your vision, your drive, shaping tomorrow. The journey continues.
Voiceover.Hindi: आपकी दृष्टि, आपका जज़्बा, कल को आकार दे रहा है। यात्रा जारी है।

Voiceover.English: From the quiet moments of creation to the loud cheers of triumph, every step forward deserves a refreshing pause. Embrace your journey, taste the energy, and ignite your spirit. Live your story. Live your refresh. Pepsi.
Voiceover.Hindi: रचना के शांत पलों से लेकर जीत के जोशीले जयकारों तक, हर आगे बढ़ा कदम एक ताज़गी भरे विराम का हकदार है। अपनी यात्रा को अपनाओ, ऊर्जा का स्वाद लो, और अपनी आत्मा को प्रज्वलित करो। अपनी कहानी जियो। अपनी ताज़गी जियो। पेप्सी।

TextOnScreen: Live Your Story. Live Your Refresh. Pepsi.

Headline: Unleash Your Inner Drive.
AdCopy: No matter the path, Nike empowers you to find your rhythm and conquer every challenge. Discover unparalleled comfort and performance, propelling you towards your greatest self.

Scenes.description: A young woman (20s) in Nike running gear, initially looking tired but determined, pushes through a morning run. Her stride becomes smoother, a faint smile appearing as the sun rises. Close-up on her Nike shoes hitting the pavement.

Voiceover.English: Every journey begins with a single step. Sometimes it's a struggle, sometimes a challenge. But within you, a spark ignites.
Voiceover.Hindi: हर सफर एक कदम से शुरू होता है। कभी यह मुश्किल होता है, कभी चुनौती भरा। पर आपके भीतर, एक चिंगारी जलती है।

Scenes.description: A man (30s-40s) in Nike basketball shorts and a t-shirt, after what appears to be a long day, takes a deep breath before driving towards the hoop. He flawlessly executes a jump shot, the ball swishing through the net. He picks up the ball with a sense of satisfaction.
Scenes.location: Outdoor basketball court, evening, under floodlights.

Voiceover.English: It's about finding your rhythm, your release. The dedication to chase what makes you feel alive, no matter the day.
Voiceover.Hindi: यह अपनी ताल, अपनी मुक्ति खोजने के बारे में है। उस जुनून के पीछे भागना जो आपको जीवंत महसूस कराता है, चाहे दिन कैसा भी हो।

Scenes.description: A diverse group (a family: mother, father, child, all wearing Nike apparel) are laughing and running freely on a sandy beach. They playfully chase each other, the child leading the way, leaving footprints in the sand as the sun sets.

Voiceover.English: And in those shared moments, those collective triumphs, you realize you're part of something bigger. Together, you rise.
Voiceover.Hindi: और उन साझा पलों में, उन सामूहिक जीतों में, आप महसूस करते हैं कि आप कुछ बड़े का हिस्सा हैं। साथ मिलकर, आप ऊपर उठते हैं।

Voiceover.English: From the first step to the last, Nike is with you. Fueling your spirit, supporting every dream. What will you do today? Find your greatness.
Voiceover.Hindi: पहले कदम से आखिरी तक, नाइकी आपके साथ है। आपकी आत्मा को ऊर्जा दे रहा है, हर सपने को सहारा दे रहा है। आज आप क्या करेंगे? अपनी महानता खोजें।

Headline: The Unsung Hero of Every Indian Dream
AdCopy: For generations, Amul has been more than just a brand; it's been the pure, wholesome foundation supporting every aspiration, every laugh, and every triumph across India.

Scenes.description: A young child (around 5-7 years old) happily drinks a glass of Amul milk, a milk mustache forming. The scene transitions to the child a few years older, energetically playing cricket with friends in a park.
Scenes.location: A cozy home kitchen, then a sunny neighborhood park.

Voiceover.English: From the first sips of goodness to the boundless energy of childhood, Amul has always been there, nurturing every moment.
Voiceover.Hindi: पोषण की पहली घूँट से लेकर बचपन की असीम ऊर्जा तक, अमूल हमेशा साथ रहा है, हर पल को पोषित करता रहा है।

Scenes.description: A young woman (early 20s) is seen studying late at night, surrounded by books, a steaming cup of Amul coffee beside her. She then transitions to a modern office setting, confidently presenting her ideas, a small smile of achievement on her face.
Scenes.location: A quiet study room at night, then a sleek office conference room.
Scenes.emotion: Determination, focus, ambition, quiet triumph, intellectual growth.

Voiceover.English: Fuelling late-night studies and powering big dreams, Amul supports every step of your journey towards success.
Voiceover.Hindi: देर रात की पढ़ाई को शक्ति देता, और बड़े सपनों को उड़ान भरता, अमूल आपकी सफलता की हर यात्रा में साथ देता है।

Scenes.description: A multi-generational family (parents, kids, grandparents) gathered around a table, laughing and enjoying a festive meal together – parathas with Amul butter, a bowl of fruit with Amul Dahi, and a special dessert made with Amul cream. A wider shot shows them celebrating a festival (e.g., Diwali or Eid) with Amul sweets, joyfully exchanging them. अमूल: भारत के सपनों को पोषित करे। हर बूंद, हर दिन।
Scenes.location: A warm, inviting dining room; a brightly decorated living room/courtyard during a festival.
Scenes.emotion: Love, warmth, togetherness, joy, tradition, celebration, belonging.

Voiceover.English: In shared laughter, festive celebrations, and the warmth of family traditions, Amul brings everyone closer, enriching every memory.
Voiceover.Hindi: साझा हँसी में, उत्सवों के जश्न में, और परिवार की गर्माहट में, अमूल सबको करीब लाता है, हर याद को समृद्ध करता है।

Voiceover.English: For generations, Amul has been more than just a brand; it's a legacy of purity, trust, and the unwavering support for every Indian's dream. Join us in celebrating a future built on wholesome goodness, together.
Voiceover.Hindi: पीढ़ियों से, अमूल सिर्फ एक ब्रांड नहीं रहा है; यह शुद्धता, विश्वास और हर भारतीय के सपने के लिए अटूट समर्थन की विरासत है। आइए, पौष्टिक अच्छाई पर बने भविष्य का जश्न मनाएं, एक साथ।

TextOnScreen: Amul: Nurturing India's Dreams. Every Drop, Every Day.
